sentences.english: Baby has more than nine months, you can eat tofu brain it?
sentences.chinese: 孩子已經九個多個月了，可以喫豆腐腦嗎？

sentences.english: We also slip in another chilled tofu dessert, almond flavour this time.
sentences.chinese: 我們又滑了點凍豆腐腦進嘴裏，這次是杏仁味的。

sentences.english: Hippocampal white tofu brain, by the "three pot" component.
sentences.chinese: 白海馬的豆腐腦，由“三鍋”組成。

sentences.english: He loves having jellied bean curd in the morning for breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 他早晨喜歡喫一碗豆腐腦兒。

definition: hot and sour soup/sour and spicy soup
zha jiang mian: ground pork simmered with salty fermented soybean paste (or other sauce) over thick wheat noodles
imagawayaki (sweet snack made of batter cooked in the shape of a car wheel, stuffed with azuki bean paste or other fillings)
soft mixed vegetable and meat roll-up
Sichuan noodles with a spicy and numbing sauce
knife-shaved noodles (pared or shaved into strips), a Shanxi specialty
shumai (shao mai) steamed dumpling/also written 燒賣|烧卖[shao1 mai4]
to soak cooked rice in soup or water/cooked rice reheated in boiling water
